title: Heart Hands Light Skin Tone
description: Two hands forming a heart shape, with a light skin tone. Expresses love, affection, and support.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the 'heart hands' emoji with light skin tone beautifully captures a gesture of love and affection through two hands forming a heart shape. Apple's meticulous design showcases smooth gradients and realistic lighting, giving the hands a soft, slightly glossy appearance that emphasizes their gentle embrace. This emoji, with its warm and sincere visual tone, is a heartfelt way to express love, appreciation, or emotional support in digital communication on Apple devices.
